data.text:
Information about the accommodation

You'll find the Mercure Hotel Groningen MartiniPlaza in southwest Groningen, close to the city's park and within easy reach of the city centre. The Groninger Museum is less than 2 kilometres away and the hotel is located next to the renowned Gasunie building. Central Groningen is only a 15-minute walk away, and you can also take the bus to the central railway station. The nearest bus stop is just a 5-minute walk from the hotel.

An American breakfast buffet is served from Monday to Friday from 06:30 until 10:00, and at weekends from 07:00 until 12:00. In the restaurant you can select a dish from the internationally orientated menu. The restaurant is open between 12:00 and 22:00. The bar is a lovely place to relax. You can enjoy a refreshing drink here between 12:00 and 01:00.

Mercure Hotel Groningen MartiniPlaza lies in the south west of the city of Groningen with good transport links to the city centre, making it easy to reach. The city park is just a stone's throw away and the MartiniPlaza conference and events centre is situated directly next to the hotel.

Rooms in Mercure Hotel Groningen Martiniplaza

Single Room

The single room at Mercure Hotel Groningen Martiniplaza offers a queen-size bed in an 18m2 space, ideal for solo travelers. The room has air conditioning, a rain shower, flat screen television and WiFi. Enjoy extra comfort with coffee and tea making facilities, climate control and room service. Average price per night: €73. Review score: 8.
